name: Cosmic Auditory Experience
description: 1569 × 4000 Pixels, Pen & Ink, Adobe Photoshop, 2016 (Remastered 2021) Music has the power to transport the listener through space and time. This piece was initially released in 2016 as a very limited run of skateboards. Less than 20 were produced. instagram.com/brianromero / twitter.com/brianromero / brianromero.com
